name: Fart Dog (CandyAngelo, jamieEGB)
description:
Fart Dog is a local multiplayer prototype game created for the Beano game jam. The goal is to kill the human if you are the dog or survive from all the farts if you are the human. The project is going to be updated with more features and bug fixes.

Human:
W,A,S,D - Movement

Left Alt - Open/Close windows

Left Control: Hold Breath (survives from the fart)

Dog:

Arrow Keys - Movement

F,G,Space bar, Right Mouse click - Farts (4 keys to fart because connected to 4 Whoopee Cushions)
